title: Todo App

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

description: A web app that show the temperature and sky for the upcomping 5 days.

title: Daily News
description: Gets data from a news API and send news through email.

description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Online Exam Management
description: Creating a complete database for a school or university and making a mail system with the exam link to the registered emails of students.

description: Implement the use of RFID sensor tags in the process of toll tax collection in the country by attaching them to each and every vehicle.

title: Helper Chatbot
description: A chatbot that knows about a specific topic and answers questions regarding that topic.

description: A chatbot built that can discuss anything with a human and is built using the Facebook API.

title: Typing Analyzer
description: A program that monitors the computer keyboard and returns the most typed words of the session.

description: A program that records the internet speed every few seconds and plots the values on the browser.

title: Monitoring Data
description: A program that monitors a particular website and periodically records the data to a remote server.

description: A program that visualizes the data collected in the previous monitoring program.

description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city.

title: Student Management System

title: Restaurant Menu Web App

title: Positive News Site
